fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional media to display above the question.

semantics.label: Task description
semantics.placeholder: Please listen carefully and write what you hear.

fields.label: Description
fields.description: You can optionally put a simple description above the text input field, useful e.g. for dialogues.

fields.label: Sound sample
fields.description: Sentence spoken in normal speed

fields.label: Sound sample slow
fields.description: Sentence spoken in slow speed

fields.label: Text
fields.description: Text that should be written. You can add alternate spellings to a word by adding a vertical line (|) behind followed by an alternative.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Maximum tries
fields.description: Will limit the number of times the samples for each sentence can be listened to.

fields.label: Maximum tries for slow speed
fields.description: Will limit the number of times the slow samples for each sentence can be listened to.

fields.label: Disable pause option
fields.description: If checked, pausing the audio while playing is not possible.

fields.label: Play button delay
fields.description: Optionally set a time period of up to three seconds that playing a button should be delayed. This is useful if you want to allow students to enter the text field before they start listening.

fields.label: Shuffle sentences
fields.description: Define when the sentences should be shuffled.

fields.label: Ignore Punctuation marks
fields.description: If checked, punctuation marks will not be considered for scoring.

fields.label: Zero mistakes mode
fields.description: If checked, only correct answers will be considered for scoring. Mistakes will not be punished.

fields.label: Value of typos
fields.description: Determine to which extent typing errors (word with 3-9 characters: up to 1 mistake, word with more than 9 characters: up to 2 mistakes) count as a real mistake.

fields.label: Word separator
fields.description: Define the separator of words different than space character to support alternate solutions with different number of words.

fields.label: Writing direction
fields.description: Set whether the sentences' language is right-to-left or left-to-right.

fields.label: Splitting of characters
fields.description: Activate if particular characters (e.g. Chinese Han characters) should be split into separate words automatically.

fields.label: Custom typo display
fields.description: If checked, typos will be displayed in a custom style distinguishing them from clear mistakes.

fields.label: Presentation of alternate solutions
fields.description: Define which alternatives should be presented for wrong or missing words in the solution.

fields.label: General feedback
fields.description: You can use several placeholders that will be replaced with the adequate number: @matches = number of matches, @total = total mistakes, @capped = capped total mistakes, @wrong = wrong words, @added = additional words, @missing = missing words, @typo = typing errors

fields.label: General feedback (zero mistakes mode)
fields.description: You can use several placeholders that will be replaced with the adequate number: @matches = number of matches, @total = total score, @wrong = wrong words, @added = additional words, @missing = missing words, @typo = typing errors
fields.default: You have entered @total word(s) correctly and @typo word(s) with minor mistakes.

fields.label: Audio not supported message
fields.default: Your browser does not support this audio.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

fields.label: Tries left (text for readspeakers and hover text)
fields.description: @number will be replaced by the current number of tries left.

fields.label: Infinite (text for readspeakers and hover text)
Your result
fields.description: @score will be replaced by the number of points. @total will be replaced by the maximum possible points.
